external_games.name: Zen-Nippon Pro Wrestling: Ouja no Tamashii

name: Zen-Nippon Pro Wrestling: Ouja no Tamashii
summary: Zen-Nippon Pro Wrestling: Soul of Champions is a 3D Japanese wrestling game that features 25 wrestlers (including one hidden wrestler) from the All Japan Pro Wrestling promotion. There are seven modes of play available in the game: One Night Match, Champion Carnival, Real World Tag League, Battle Royal, Create Edit (Create-a-Wrestler), MVP Season Mode, and Defend Title (hidden mode).
